MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH26 postcode area of Penicuik. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:10pm due to emergency network checks being required at the Carlops substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:50pm on Tuesday, 06 April 2021
